title: The Werewolf of Washington (1973, Thriller) A werewolf is loose in the White House!

sources.title: The Werewolf of Washington (1973, Thriller) A werewolf is loose in the White House!
sources.description:
A reporter who has had an affair with the daughter of the U.S. President is sent to Hungary. There he is bitten by a werewolf, and then gets transferred back to Washington, where he gets a job as press assistant to the President. Then bodies start turning up in D.C.

Original title: The Werewolf of Washington (1973) AKA: Werewolf at Midnight

Director & Writer: Milton Moses Ginsberg
Stars: Dean Stockwell, Katalin Kallay, Henry Ferrentino 
Genre:  Cult Film, Action, Comedy, Horror, Sci-Fi
Budget: $100,000
